cards.title: Haste
powers: Add 3 tokens to your speed pool.{BR}Until the start of your next turn, when a non-hero card enters play, you may remove 2 tokens from your speed pool. If you do, play a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: Select a target. Reduce the next damage dealt to that target by 2.

openingLines.LaCapitanCharacter: A time... pirate? That's... no, that's awesome! Definitely using that in my next script!
openingLines.LaCapitanTeamCharacter: A time... pirate? That's... no, that's awesome! Definitely using that in my next script!
openingLines.FrictionTeamCharacter: Finally, a villain who can move! So refreshing.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: No matter how bad things may seem, there's always a future!

cards.title: Bullet Time
powers: [y=0.94]Add 3 tokens to your speed pool.{BR}{BR}Until the start of your next turn, when {Haste} would be dealt damage by a source other than {Haste}, remove any number of tokens from your speed pool.{BR}{BR}If the number of tokens equals or exceeds that damage, prevent that damage.

flavorQuotes.text: What's it like to move that fast?
Like watching paint dry.

cards.title: Folding Time
body: When one of your cards enters play, {Haste} may deal 1 target 1 energy damage. You may remove a token from your speed pool. If you do, increase that damage by 1.
When {Haste} deals himself damage, draw up to X cards, where X = the damage dealt this way.

flavorQuotes.text: If I understood what you{BR}were about to do, I'd do it myself.{BR}All I know for sure is that your{BR}personal timeline is about to... [b]compress[/b].

cards.title: High-Speed Collision
body: Remove any number of tokens from your speed pool.
{Haste} deals 1 target X melee damage, where X = 2 plus the number of tokens removed this way.

flavorQuotes.text: What you give, you get, ten times over.

cards.title: In a Flash
body: Add 2 tokens to your speed pool.
You may draw a card.
Destroy any number of hero ongoing or equipment cards. For each card destroyed this way, you may destroy an environment or ongoing card.

flavorQuotes.text: No matter how thin you slice space,{BR}I'll still have plenty of time.

cards.title: Instant Analysis
body: When this card enters play, add 2 tokens to your speed pool.
At the end of your turn, you may remove any number of tokens from your speed pool. X players draw a card, where X = the number of tokens removed this way.

flavorQuotes.text: Why do you hesitate?{BR}You know what you must do.

cards.title: Killing Time
body: When a card would add tokens to your speed pool, increase the number of tokens added by 1.
At the start of your turn, increase the next damage dealt to {Haste} by 1 for every 10 tokens in your speed pool. Then {Haste} deals himself 0 irreducible toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: I understand, but I need you{BR}to reign it in next time. It doesn't{BR}matter how fast you are{BR}if the [b]air[/b] can't keep up.

cards.title: Motion Blur
body: When you play a card, you may select a target that has not been selected this way this turn. Reduce the next damage dealt by that target by 1.
powers: Play a card. You may discard a card to play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Le temps perdu ne se rattrape pas!

cards.title: Quick Reactions
body: When this card enters play, add 3 tokens to your speed pool.

When a hero ongoing or equipment would be destroyed, you may remove 3 tokens from your speed pool. If you do, put that card on top of its deck instead. Otherwise, if it is one of your cards, add 2 tokens to your speed pool.

flavorQuotes.text: Now, let's see how you fight{BR}without your silly tricks.
Oh, cool!

cards.title: Running Circles
body: When this card enters play, add 3 tokens to your speed pool.
When you discard a card, add a token to your speed pool.
At the end of your turn, you may discard a card and draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Was that bullet meant for me?{BR}Anyway, if I move the betrayal{BR}to the first act, Act Two{BR}shouldn't stagnate so much.

cards.title: Scouting Ahead
body: When this card enters play, add 4 tokens to your speed pool.
At the end of your turn, you may remove 2 tokens from your speed pool. If you do, discard the top card of a deck or reveal and replace it, then repeat this text.

flavorQuotes.text: You have all the time in the world.{BR}You can't look around?{BR}Assess the situation?

cards.title: Standing Still
body: When {Haste} deals himself damage, he deals up to X targets other than himself 2 melee damage each, where X = the damage dealt this way.
powers: Add a token to your speed pool. {Haste} deals a target 2 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Like shooting fish{BR}in a barrel of molasses.

cards.title: Streak of Fists
body: Remove any number of tokens from your speed pool.
{Haste} deals X targets 2 melee damage each, where X = 2 plus the number of tokens removed this way.
You may draw or play a card. If you draw a card this way, shuffle this card into your deck.

flavorQuotes.text: The Santaiyin are unimpressed{BR}with your feeble antics. You are{BR}hopelessly outnumbered. Surrender{BR}to the inevitable!

cards.title: The Sands of Time
body: Increase damage dealt by {Haste} by 1.
At the end of your turn, {Haste} may deal himself 2 energy damage. If he takes no damage this way, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Friday, translate?
He said 'Gold that will shine, must pass through the fire.'
Oh dear.

cards.title: Unmatched Alacrity
body: When you would add tokens to your speed pool, reduce the number of tokens added this way by 2.
At the end of each turn, you may remove 1 token from your speed pool to draw a card, play a card, or use a power.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: You can't be everywheeree{BR}aaaat oooooooonnnnnnnnc-
Watch me!

cards.title: Violating Causality
body: Add 2 tokens to your speed pool.
You may remove a token from your speed pool to put the top card of another trash into play or on the bottom of its deck.
If a card enters play this way, {Haste} deals himself 2 energy damage. Otherwise, repeat this text.

flavorQuotes.text: What use is your speed?{BR}Time and space are an illusion. Your father{BR}could see that. Why can't you?

cards.flavorReference: Zeno, Future Comics: Space and Time one-shot
